title: UK-CAN component at Imperial and the NHM - X-ray microdiffraction
abstractText: UK CAN is the UK Cosmochemistry Analysis Network, a consortium of the main groups of laboratory-based astronomers in the UK. Monica Grady is PI, and there are 8 additional Co-Is from Imperial College, Manchester Univ, Natural History Museum and Open Univ. The aim is to allow for increased collaboration using shared resources.
